channel.title: Basic login
channel.description: Ok very noob question how do i join a server so far i have been puting the port number in for some of the servers i saw in advertisement and than there ip address is this wrong cuz i cant loggin lol plz plz plz help!

item.title: Basic login
item.dc:creator: @Ice Ice
item.description:
@Ice wrote:

Hi i’m Ice,
You don’t need to put a port in. You need to put the Server ip in the correct place. Then log in. The server may not be online ?

Read full topic

item.title: Basic login
item.dc:creator: @ironclad666 ironclad666
item.description:
@ironclad666 wrote:

Lol “goto sleep”?
umm never checked my firewall… i am at school to tell you the truth

What do u mean get an IP AND PORT?

Read full topic

item.title: Basic login
item.dc:creator: @PEN_R PEN()R
item.description:
@PEN_R wrote:

firstly Go to sleep, Secondly Get a IP AND PORT And make sure your firewall is not blocking servers. Then Press the hard finding button “enter” or “Log In”.

Read full topic
